---
title: "About"
---

_Stacks on Stacks_ is a microblog maintained by RDS @ Utrecht University Library

The name _Stacks on Stacks_ refers to the structured information and physical composition of the library.

Information on library activies, events, and goings on, will be posted here with some frequency.

You can interact with these posts via [Hypothes.is](https://web.hypothes.is/)
